title: Pre-K Activities
description: A cozy place to begin exploring numbers and shapes

level1.title: Number Awareness & Counting
level1.goal: Children understand that numbers have names and represent 'how many.'

level2.title: Subitizing & Quantity
level2.goal: Children can see 'how many' without counting one-by-one.

level3.title: Number Relationships
level3.goal: Children see that numbers are made of smaller parts.

level4.title: Comparing & Change
level4.goal: Children understand more, less, same, add one, take one.

finger-counting.title: Finger Counting Songs
finger-counting.description: Count fingers up and down with fun rhymes

snack-counting.title: Snack Counting
snack-counting.description: Count yummy snacks before eating them
snack-counting.complete: You counted snacks in all {n} rounds! Great job!

toy-lineup.title: Toy Line-Up
toy-lineup.description: Line up 1-5 toys and count together

number-hunt.title: Number Hunt
number-hunt.success: ğŸ‰ Great! You found all the {n}s!
number-hunt.complete: You completed all {n} number hunts! Great job!

roll-and-count.title: Roll & Count
roll-and-count.description: Roll a die and place that many blocks
roll-and-count.howMany: How many dots are on the dice?
roll-and-count.rollInstruction: Roll the dice to see how many blocks to add!
roll-and-count.rolled: You rolled {n}! Tap to add {n} blocks.
roll-and-count.tooMany: Oops! That's too many. Try again!
roll-and-count.complete: You completed all {n} rounds! Great counting!

zero-basket.title: Zero Basket
zero-basket.description: Learn about zero with an empty basket
zero-basket.howMany: How many {fruit}s are in the basket?
zero-basket.howManyEmpty: The basket is empty! How many items?
zero-basket.zeroCorrect: ğŸ‰ Yes! Zero means nothing is there!
zero-basket.zeroWrong: The basket is empty - that's zero!
zero-basket.wrong: Not quite! There are {n} in the basket.
zero-basket.complete: You learned about zero and counting!

jump-and-count.title: Jump & Count
jump-and-count.tapToJump: ğŸ¦˜ Tap here to make me jump!
jump-and-count.complete: You completed all {n} jumping rounds! Great counting!

bath-toy-count.title: Bath Toy Count
bath-toy-count.description: Count toys going in and out
bath-toy-count.howManyIn: How many toys are in the tub?
bath-toy-count.howManyTotal: How many toys are there in total?
bath-toy-count.complete: Great bath time counting! You counted {n} rounds!

flash-dot-cards.title: Flash Dot Cards
flash-dot-cards.description: Quick! How many dots did you see?
flash-dot-cards.howMany: How many dots did you see?

dice-play.title: Dice Play
dice-play.description: Say the number without counting dots
dice-play.howMany: How many dots do you see?

egg-carton-dots.title: Egg Carton Dots
egg-carton-dots.description: Spot dot patterns in egg cartons!
egg-carton-dots.howMany: How many dots do you see?

snack-guess.title: Snack Guess & Check
snack-guess.description: Guess how many, then count to check!
snack-guess.correct: ğŸ‰ Great guess! There are {n} snacks!

cup-reveal.title: Cup Reveal Game
cup-reveal.description: Peek under the cup - how many?
cup-reveal.howMany: How many were under the cup?

clap-and-guess.title: Clap & Guess
clap-and-guess.description: Listen to claps and guess the number!
clap-and-guess.howMany: How many claps did you hear?

button-toss.title: Button Toss
button-toss.description: Toss buttons and name the quantity!

same-or-different.title: Same or Different?
same-or-different.description: Compare two groups - are they the same?
same-or-different.question: Do both groups have the same number?
same-or-different.correctDiff: ğŸ‰ Right! {a} is not the same as {b}!

split-the-toys.title: Split the Toys
split-the-toys.description: Split toys into two piles different ways
split-the-toys.clickHint: ğŸ‘† Click Add to add a toy, or click the pile to return one!

playdough-break.title: Playdough Break
playdough-break.description: Roll one ball, break it into parts
playdough-break.breakBall: The ball breaks into two pieces!
playdough-break.whichSplit: Which way did the ball split?
playdough-break.wrong: Look again! The ball split into {left} and {right}

snack-sharing.title: Snack Sharing
snack-sharing.clickHint: ğŸ‘† Click Add to add a snack, or click the plate to return one!

box-and-lid.title: Box & Lid Game
box-and-lid.description: Hide some objects, show the rest
box-and-lid.totalIn: There are {total} items in the box
box-and-lid.howManyHidden: How many are hidden under the lid?

build-and-break.title: Build & Break Towers
build-and-break.description: Stack blocks, then split them up
build-and-break.towerComplete: Tower complete! Now let's break it into parts!
build-and-break.clickHint: ğŸ‘† Click Add to add a block, or click the tower to return one!
build-and-break.wrong: Look again! The tower split into {left} and {right}

story-mats.title: Story Mats
story-mats.description: Tell stories with parts: pond and land

who-has-more.title: Who Has More?
who-has-more.description: Compare piles and find who has more

feed-the-monster.title: Feed the Monster
feed-the-monster.description: Monster wants more or fewer blocks
feed-the-monster.correct: ğŸ‰ Yum! The monster is happy with {n} blocks!
feed-the-monster.wrongMore: The monster wanted MORE! Add blocks!
feed-the-monster.wrongFewer: The monster wanted FEWER! Remove blocks!

take-one-away.title: Take One Away
take-one-away.description: Remove one and see what's left

add-one-game.title: Add One Game
add-one-game.description: Add one block to the tower
add-one-game.howManyNow: How many blocks are there now?

one-more-cookie.title: One More Cookie
one-more-cookie.description: If you get one more cookie, how many will you have?

balance-plates.title: Balance Plates
balance-plates.description: Add or remove items to balance

toy-shop.title: Toy Shop Role Play
toy-shop.description: Buy and sell toys - more or less?
toy-shop.howManyAfterBuy: If you buy {n} more, how many will you have?
toy-shop.howManyAfterSell: If you sell {n}, how many will you have?
toy-shop.correct: ğŸ‰ Right! You have {n} toys now!

musical-counting.title: Musical Counting
musical-counting.description: Add and remove from the circle
musical-counting.howManyDancing: How many friends are dancing now?

cleanup-math.title: Clean-Up Math
cleanup-math.description: Did we put away more or fewer toys?
cleanup-math.correctMore: ğŸ‰ Right! We have FEWER toys now!
cleanup-math.correctFewer: ğŸ‰ Right! We have MORE toys now!
cleanup-math.correctSame: ğŸ‰ Right! We have the SAME number!

numberblocks-1-5.title: Numberblocks Ep 1â€“5: One to Five
numberblocks-1-5.description: Meet the Numberblocks and learn numbers 1-5

numberblocks-ten.title: Numberblocks Ep 20: Ten
numberblocks-ten.description: A big number! See how Ten is made

numberblocks-whats-my-number.title: Numberblocks Ep 94: What's My Number?
numberblocks-whats-my-number.description: Guess the number game with Numberblocks

numberblocks-whole-of-me.title: Numberblocks Ep 12: The Whole of Me â­
numberblocks-whole-of-me.description: The MOST important episode about parts and wholes!

numberblocks-hide-seek.title: Numberblocks Ep 15: Hide and Seek
numberblocks-hide-seek.description: Numbers hide and show their parts

numberblocks-fruit-salad.title: Numberblocks Ep 34: Fruit Salad
numberblocks-fruit-salad.description: Mix different parts to make a whole

numberblocks-another-one.title: Numberblocks Ep 2: Another One
numberblocks-another-one.description: What happens when you add one more?

numberblocks-blockzilla.title: Numberblocks Ep 32: Blockzilla
numberblocks-blockzilla.description: A big adventure with adding and taking away
